title: Social distancing in pedestrian dynamics and its effect on disease spreading
excerpt: This paper is on the mathematical modeling of social distancing and its effects on the spread of contagious diseases
citation: Sina Sajjadi, Alireza Hashemi, and Fakhteh Ghanbarnejad, Phys. Rev. E 104, 014313

title: Chaotic dynamics of active topological defects
excerpt: This paper discusses the emergence of chaos in a system of topological defects in active nematics
citation: Alireza Hashemi & Mohammad Reza Ejtehadi (2021) Chaotic dynamics of active topological defects, Soft Materials, DOI: 10.1080/1539445X.2021.1887222

title: Analysis of the ground-state energy eigenvalues of fractal quantum potentials
excerpt: This paper is on the numerical calculation of the ground state energy eigenvalues for quantum fractal potentials
citation: Alireza Hashemi and Amir Hossein Darooneh 2019 Phys. Scr. 94 115802

title: Radiative heat transfer: many-body effects
venue: Iranian Journal of Astronomy and Astrophysics
excerpt: This paper is about the effects of fractal structures of a system of nanoparticles on their radiative heat transfer properties
citation: Nikbakht, M., Ahmadian, S., Hashemi, A. (2017). Radiative heat transfer: many-body effects. Iranian Journal of Astronomy and Astrophysics, 4(2), 113-120. doi: 10.22128/ijaa.2017.111
